name: Cave Pilot
description:
The game was created for 2017 January 1GAM.

This time you will have to show your skills by flying through a cave in a plane, avoiding dangerous obstacles and collecting stars for that oh so satisfying 'ding!'. The deeper you get into the cave, the harder it gets.

The game reminds of the classic copter or helicopter games, but obstacles resemble the flappy bird games. The game is pretty casual, but not too easy. Good luck!
